extendedInfo.description: A fun widget of a Wonder Woman "Andy" Droid made entirely using UCCWLiven up your homescreen with Wonder Andi and assign apps/shortcuts to the Hotspots on the widgetYou MUST have UCCW 2.1.2 or higher installed on your device or these skins WILL NOT work.****This skin will only appear in UCCW after you place a widget on your homescreen. It does not appear in your app drawer or if you open UCCW from your app drawer****Eight Hotspots available (See Picture) - All set to Open UCCW EditorEach Hotspot can be assigned to a different app/shortcut......Default has been set to 'Open UCCW Editor' for easy access to configurations. When you place the widget on your homescreen, touch any hotspot to begin assigning themAdding skin to your homescreen1. Add a 4x4 UCCW widget to your homescreen by long pressing homescreen or browsing widgets in app drawer2. Select Wonder Andi from UCCW menu3. Resize before hitting "Touch Here" (This is so that the Hotspots will be correctly aligned)4. Hit "Touch Here" to load the skin If you have any problems or queries please do not hesitate to email meEnjoy and thank you :o)
